problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C在AB的延长线上,CD与⊙O相切,切点为D,如果∠A=35°,那么∠C=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point C is on the extended line of AB, CD is tangent to ⊙O, and the tangent point is D. If ∠A = N_0, then ∠C = ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OD,∵CD是⊙O的切线,∴OD⊥CD,即∠ODC=90°,∵AB为直径,∴∠COD=2∠A=70°,∴∠C=90°-70°=20°,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查切线的性质,掌握过切点的半径与切线垂直是解题的关键．
